lead_paragraph: Stocks sank in afternoon trading after a report showed the economy shrank in the first three months of the year.

headline.print_headline: Weaker U.S. Economy and Gloom in Greece Weigh on Wall St.
headline.main: Market Slides Back After a Downward Revision of G.D.P.

snippet: Stocks sank in afternoon trading after a report showed the economy shrank in the first three months of the year.
abstract: Stocks fall following report that United States economy contracted in first quarter.
